1.text: 8.1) Listen, follow the directions and name the buildings.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>8.1) Listen, follow the directions and name the buildings.</prosody></speak>

2.text: Now compare your map with your friend's map.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Now compare your map with your friend's map.</prosody></speak>

3.text: 8.2) Read and underline the correct sentence.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>8.2) Read and underline the correct sentence.</prosody></speak>

4.text: 1. a) The school is on the corner of Upper Street and Sea Street. b) The railway station is on the corner of Upper Street and Sea Street. c) The bank is on the corner of Upper Street and Sea Street.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. a) The school is on the corner of Upper Street and Sea Street. b) The railway station is on the corner of Upper Street and Sea Street. c) The bank is on the corner of Upper Street and Sea Street.</prosody></speak>

5.text: 2. a) The playground is opposite the pharmacy. b) The playground is opposite the post office. c) The playground is opposite the cafe.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>2. a) The playground is opposite the pharmacy. b) The playground is opposite the post office. c) The playground is opposite the cafe.</prosody></speak>

6.text: 3. a) The clock tower is next to the railway station. b) The clock tower is next to the school. c) The clock tower is next to the hospital.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>3. a) The clock tower is next to the railway station. b) The clock tower is next to the school. c) The clock tower is next to the hospital.</prosody></speak>
